modName: LordMikukiSan's Racemenu Presets and bodylside files
summary: Not very creative with titles. There are 5 character racemenu presets alongside 4 bodyslide bodies.
descriptionHtml:
[center]These are various characters of mine I have decided to share alongside their bodyslide preset.
These aren't save files they are just racemenu presets and bodyslide files.

Don't be scared to share pictures!

They are all Nord race except for the Orc.

The bodyslide files are separated from the racemenu files. You can pick a girl  or the guy you like and use whatever body you want it doesn't have to 
be any of mine. The bodyslide files are named after the girl that uses it(except Rose bodypreset which is shared with Violet.)
Images are small here but you can check out the full size images on the images above or in the tab.

For the racemenu presets just install and load the chracter in the preset tab in racemenu.
For the bodies open bodyslide and build the body/feet/hands or just batch build everything.

[color=#ff0000]The bodies where made for UUNP. They might work with cbbe but they wont look the same because
they are completely different.[/color]

[font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]Racemenu Presets Requires a combination of:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Racemenu[/url] (All)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56056/?]Mikan Eyes[/url] (Rose, Ashley, Arkady)
 [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70603/?]New Mikan Eyes[/url] (Violet)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70363/?]HDT Ks Hairdos [/url](Rose,Violet)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]Ks Hairdos[/url] (Arkady,Ashley, Brassi)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]Fair Skin Complexion[/url] (All excluding male)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61178/?]Adorable Face[/url] (All excluding male)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D2488&pUp=1]Better Males[/url] [/size][/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/download/26469]Faces - YoungerFacesMergedWithMenByGeonox[/url] [font=Comic Sans MS][size=4](For the male)
I also used SoS for the male body.
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]
Bodyslide presets Requires:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]Bodyslide[/url]
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT-PE
[/url]
[/size][/font][color=#e06666][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5]Rose:[/size][/font]
[/color]Age:20 Height:0.92 Weight:0 [font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]
[/size][/font]Backstory: She grew up as an orphan for the most of her life. Her mother died from childbirth while her father died to a corrupt king.
She was left with a poor blacksmith in the kingdom's outskirts. At the age of 14 she found out what had happened to her parents
so she trained for years. She befriended the king and got a job as a knight. She soon climbed up ranks and became the king's general.
She used her authority to gather information on the king to create an uprising against the king. She replaced him as the new queen and she soon
created a peaceful kingdom. She drastically reduced poverty and gave every person a job. That would later end at the age of 20 her kingdom 
fell under attack dragon's who destroyed everything and killed everyone but a few people. With nothing left she sought out to find the dragon
who killed her people. She has always preferred the use of light armor and daggers.
She is the smallest character of all.

Please note that for this character I use: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69498/?]Freckles[/url]
It's the 10th on complexion for me. This doesn't seem to save with the presets. It isn't required
but if you want the same freckles use that.


This body type starts of as a small skinny b-cup that gets noticeably bigger around the thighs
with a decent amount of breast increase. Arms become slightly thicker and the body becomes a bit wider.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/ykWZWQM.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/iwdaOjh.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/lrpef5N.png[/img]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#8e7cc3][size=5]Violet:[/size][/color]
[/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]Age:22 Weight:100 height:0.94
[/size][color=#f4f4f4]She is Rose's older sister. They never knew of each other until after Rose starting hunting the dragon. Even though they 
[/color]haven't known each other much they trust each other. At a young age she wandered off and got lost in the woods. She was later found by a
family who took care of her. She left the kingdom before Rose had it control. She wanders around doing random jobs. She is 2 years older than Rose. She tends to kill her enemies with poisoning them.
This preset shares the same body as Rose but weights 100.
 [img]http://i.imgur.com/k2Pel1q.png[/img]



[color=#ffff00][size=5]Ashley:[/size][/color]
Age:24 Weight: 75 Height:0.96

She is Rose's best friend. She was a maid for the king who was trained since a small child. She always resented the king so she
would help Rose in anyway and received lessons from her. Although unlike Rose she prefers to use heavy armor with a sword and shield.
She always had a girl crush on Rose but couldn't get the courage to tell her. She did use the stress Rose had to sleep with her for one night
but Rose felt like it was a mistake. They remained close friends although they went separate ways after the fall of the kingdom although they did occasionally crossed paths.

This body preset is somewhat thick around the thighs. The breases are medium size but become large at max weight.
As the weight goes up the breasts are pushed together to simulate cleavage. The thighs and butt
increase a medium amount.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/LAe71rg.png[/img]
[/font][font=Comic Sans MS][img]http://i.imgur.com/nB83I6Q.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/PMjcdIt.png[/img]

[color=#38761d][size=5]Brassi Ka-Le[/size][/color]
Age:25 Weight:50 Height:1 

An orc who befriends Rose after the fall of her kingdom. A group of ors where trying to kill the few people that survived
and pillage the village. She stepped in and saved a few people by betraying her people. Now good friends they help each other whenever they need.
She likes to use orcish armor and a maul since swords don't allow her to crush her enemies skulls. In case you hadn't noticed her name
is sort of a pun and play of words. removing th "-" would turn her second name into Kale as in the plant. Part of the
genus of kale is Brassica. 

Please not that for this character I use these [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48490/?]eyes[/url] but aren't required. They are
a better version of the red vanilla orc eyes. You don't have to use it if you don't want.

This body is thick overall. Bigger thigs and butt that the previous but the breasts start
small and turn to a medium perky size. The belly is bigger than the rest but is not fat.
[/font][img]http://i.imgur.com/JbxwqjL.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/6FOzRKw.png[/img][/center][center][font=Comic Sans MS][/font][img]http://i.imgur.com/SYM6tkn.png[/img]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#000000][size=5]Arkady:[/size][/color]
Age:26 Weight:40 Height:1
[/font]He was the heir to a neighbouring kingdom. Rose opened up trades with the kingdom and became friends with the king and
his son. After time had passed they fell in love and married. He moved in with her and became general of the army and weapon's engineer. Although he came from a rich background he trained how to use a bow as his primary weapon. He prefers light armor, a bow, a single sword or dagger, and a buckler. He is believed to be dead.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/tAOMMt3.jpg[/img]

Rose Original preset and body:
It's the old and original version I had. requirements are: 
The latest Racemenu by expired and all it's requirements by : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?

Fair Skin Complexion by HHaleyy: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?
Adorable face by luminalion: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61178/?
Better make up v1 by diehardt: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31665/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D31665&pUp=1
                                                                                     Mikan Eyes by nerune2525: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56056/?

Sg Hair pack by HelloSanta(I think you need to goolge this one)
